text.0: :delivery_truck: No, 4 #Zambian trucks weren’t set alight in #SouthAfrica in late 2020 as part of a “recent wave of violent protests against foreign truck drivers”, as claimed in a post shared to Facebook. https://t.co/7A9GrRvOpb
text.1:
:hot_beverage: We get it – you love your coffee. But can you really down “even 25 cups” of the brew every day, at no risk to your heart? 

Coffee consumption can be part of a healthy lifestyle, but here’s what you need to know: https://t.co/ToqtngVMZR
